targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  `toStartOfMinute`(
    `toTimeZone`(
      `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`event_timestamp_ts`,
      'UTC'
    )
  ) AS `event_timestamp_ts`,
  `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`track_type` AS `track_type`,
  `toFloat64`(
    SUM(
      `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`interval_packets_lost`
    )
  ) / NULLIF(
    `toFloat64`(
      SUM(
        `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`interval_packets_lost`
      )
    ) + `toFloat64`(
      SUM(
        `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`interval_bytes_received`
      )
    ),
    0
  ) AS `Packet Loss`
FROM
  `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`
WHERE

  `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`gateway` LIKE '%-staging-ai-staging-livepeer-ai-gateway-%.livepeer.monster%'
  and $__timeFilter(event_timestamp_ts)
GROUP BY
  `toStartOfMinute`(
    `toTimeZone`(
      `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`event_timestamp_ts`,
      'UTC'
    )
  ),
  `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`track_type`
ORDER BY
  `toStartOfMinute`(
    `toTimeZone`(
      `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`event_timestamp_ts`,
      'UTC'
    )
  ) ASC,
  `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`track_type` ASC

SELECT
  `source`.`first_error_message` AS `first_error_message`,
  COUNT(*) AS `count`
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`stream_id` AS `stream_id`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`pipeline_id` AS `pipeline_id`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`user_agent_raw` AS `user_agent_raw`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`browser_type` AS `browser_type`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`device_type` AS `device_type`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`is_mobile` AS `is_mobile`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`hostname` AS `hostname`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`is_comfy_staging_gateway` AS `is_comfy_staging_gateway`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`request_count` AS `request_count`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`first_event_timestamp_ts` AS `first_event_timestamp_ts`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`last_event_timestamp_ts` AS `last_event_timestamp_ts`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`mid_stream_failure` AS `mid_stream_failure`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`restart_count` AS `restart_count`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`event_messages` AS `event_messages`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`event_message_string` AS `event_message_string`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`excusable_errors` AS `excusable_errors`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`error_count` AS `error_count`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`all_excusable_errors` AS `all_excusable_errors`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`total_time_diff_ms` AS `total_time_diff_ms`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`startup_completed` AS `startup_completed`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`user_generated_stream` AS `user_generated_stream`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`gateway_startup_completed` AS `gateway_startup_completed`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`videojs_fallback` AS `videojs_fallback`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`gateway_start_up_time_ms` AS `gateway_start_up_time_ms`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`first_event` AS `first_event`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`last_event` AS `last_event`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`first_error_message` AS `first_error_message`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`request_ids` AS `request_ids`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`orch_count` AS `orch_count`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`orch_urls` AS `orch_urls`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`events_sequence` AS `events_sequence`,
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`is_comfy_staging_gateway` AS `is_comfy_staging_gateway`,
      CASE
        WHEN `positionUTF8`(
          `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author`.`email`,
          'livepeer.org'
        ) > 0 THEN '1'
        ELSE '0'
      END AS `Internal User`,
      CASE
        WHEN `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream`.`whip_url` = '' THEN 'missing'
        ELSE CASE
          WHEN `extract`(
            `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream`.`whip_url`,
            '(live|aiWebrtc)/'
          ) = 'live' THEN 'gateway'
          ELSE 'mediamtx'
        END
      END AS `whip_server`,
      CASE
        WHEN `positionUTF8`(
          `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author`.`email`,
          'infraservice'
        ) > 0 THEN 'load test'
        ELSE CASE
          WHEN `positionUTF8`(
            `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author`.`email`,
            'privy.io'
          ) > 0 THEN 'e2e'
          ELSE CASE
            WHEN `positionUTF8`(
              `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author`.`email`,
              '@livepeer.org'
            ) > 0 THEN 'internal'
            ELSE 'user'
          END
        END
      END AS `User Type`,
      `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream`.`id` AS `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream__id`,
      `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream`.`name` AS `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream__name`,
      `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream`.`stream_key` AS `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream__stream_key`,
      `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream`.`author` AS `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream__author`,
      `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream`.`output_playback_id` AS `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream__output_playback_id`,
      `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream`.`created_at` AS `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream__created_at`,
      `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream`.`gateway_host` AS `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream__gateway_host`,
      `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream`.`is_smoke_test` AS `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream__is_smoke_test`,
      `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream`.`whip_url` AS `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream__whip_url`,
      `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream`.`_peerdb_synced_at` AS `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream___peerdb_synced_at`,
      `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author`.`id` AS `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author__id`,
      `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author`.`name` AS `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author__name`,
      `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author`.`email` AS `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author__email`,
      `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author`.`created_at` AS `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author__created_at`,
      `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author`.`provider` AS `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author__provider`,
      `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author`.`_peerdb_synced_at` AS `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author___peerdb_synced_at`,
      `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline`.`id` AS `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline__id`,
      `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline`.`name` AS `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline__name`,
      `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline`.`key` AS `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline__key`,
      `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline`.`author` AS `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline__author`,
      `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline`.`description` AS `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline__description`,
      `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline`.`type` AS `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline__type`,
      `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline`.`created_at` AS `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline__created_at`,
      `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline`.`updated_at` AS `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline__updated_at`,
      `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline`.`is_private` AS `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline__is_private`,
      `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline`.`is_featured` AS `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline__is_featured`,
      `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline`.`model_card` AS `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline__model_card`,
      `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline`.`_peerdb_synced_at` AS `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline___peerdb_4080d2c9`
    FROM
      `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`
     
LEFT JOIN `network_events`.`daydream_streams_latest_table` AS `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream` ON `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`stream_id` = `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream`.`id`
      LEFT JOIN `network_events`.`daydream_users_latest_table` AS `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author` ON `Daydream Streams Latest Table - Stream`.`author` = `Daydream Users Latest Table - Author`.`id`
      LEFT JOIN `network_events`.`daydream_pipelines_latest_table` AS `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline` ON `network_events`.`stream_trace_summary_view`.`pipeline_id` = `Daydream Pipelines Latest Table - Pipeline`.`id`
  ) AS `source`
WHERE (
  `source`.`is_comfy_staging_gateway` = false
  AND
  `source`.`startup_completed` = 0
)
GROUP BY
  `source`.`first_error_message`
HAVING
  COUNT(*) > 50
ORDER BY
  `source`.`first_error_message` ASC

panels.description: Displays the average jitter for streams in milliseconds (ms). The threshold is 30 ms—any value above this should be investigated

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`track_type` AS `track_type`,
  `toStartOfMinute`(
    `toTimeZone`(
      `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`event_timestamp_ts`,
      'UTC'
    )
  ) AS `event_timestamp_ts`,
  AVG(
    `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`jitter_ms`
  ) AS `avg`
FROM
  `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`
WHERE `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`gateway` LIKE '%-staging-ai-staging-livepeer-ai-gateway-%.livepeer.monster%'
GROUP BY
  `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`track_type`,
  `toStartOfMinute`(
    `toTimeZone`(
      `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`event_timestamp_ts`,
      'UTC'
    )
  )
ORDER BY
  `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`track_type` ASC,
  `toStartOfMinute`(
    `toTimeZone`(
      `network_events`.`stream_ingest_metrics_view`.`event_timestamp_ts`,
      'UTC'
    )
  ) ASC

panels.title: Average Ingest Jitter

panels.description: Shows the number of occurrences of each unique ‘Live video pipeline’ error in the last 15 minutes, grouped by error type

targets.expr: sum by(errorr) (count_over_time({container="ai-gateway", app=~"staging-livepeer-ai-gateway-.*"} |= `Live video pipeline finished with error` | pattern `<_>Live video pipeline finished with error: <errorr>` [15m]))

panels.title: Ai Video Pipeline Errors by Type

panels.description: If O does not respond to a request from G within 45s, then G will not retry and flag this error.

targets.expr: sum by(pipeline, model_name, region) (increase(livepeer_ai_request_errors{error_code=~"no orchestrators available.*", pipeline=~"live-.*", livepeer_live_app="staging-livepeer-ai-gateway"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: No Orchestrators Available errors per Region

targets.expr: sum by(normalized_error_code, model_name) (label_replace(label_replace(increase(livepeer_ai_request_errors{pipeline=~"live-.*", livepeer_live_app="staging-livepeer-ai-gateway"}[1m]), "normalized_error_code", "no orchestrators available", "error_code", "no orchestrators available.*"), "normalized_error_code", "$1", "error_code", "(.*)"))

panels.description: This graph shows the amount of idle containers.
panels.title: Global Available Capacity (Idle Runners)

targets.expr: sum by(node_name) (count_over_time({container=~"NOT_ai-gateway|live-video-to-video_comfyui_89.+", group=~".*staging_primary"} |= `UserWarning: torch.cuda.current_device() did not return a device, returning a CPU torch device` [1h]))

panels.description: This dashboard monitors the number of streams per orchestrator.
panels.title: Streams per Orchestrator

panels.description: This graph shows the number of idle GPUs. If it goes above 0 for 5 minutes, then this alert will go off.
panels.title: Idle GPUs > 0

panels.description: SlowOrchestrator is a strong indicator of network connectivity issues between G/O and these tend to persist for a few hours until the tubes clear up or someone kicks something.

targets.expr: sum by(host, region) (count_over_time({container="ai-gateway", app=~"staging-livepeer-ai-gateway-.*"} |= `slow orchestrator` | regexp `url=https?://(?P<host>[^/:]+)` [1h]))

panels.title: Slow Orchestrators

targets.expr: sum by(pipeline, model_name) (increase(livepeer_ai_request_errors{error_code=~"no orchestrators available.*", pipeline=~"live-.*", livepeer_live_app="staging-livepeer-ai-gateway"}[1m]))

panels.description: This dashboard monitors the number of streams per orchestrator.
panels.title: Streams per Orchestrator

targets.legendFormat: {{node_name}} CurrEstab - TCP connections for which the current state is either ESTABLISHED or CLOSE- WAIT
{{node_name}} MaxConn - Limit on the total number of TCP connections the entity can support (Dinamic is "-1")

links.title: Network Traffic Basic on Node exporter

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`orchestrator_url` AS `orchestrator_url`,
  `median`(`network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`output_fps`) AS `median`,
  MAX(`network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`output_fps`) AS `max`
FROM
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`
WHERE
`network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`gateway` LIKE '%-staging-ai-staging-livepeer-ai-gateway-%.livepeer.monster%'
and $__timeFilter(event_timestamp_ts)
GROUP BY
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`orchestrator_url`
ORDER BY
  `median` DESC,
  `network_events`.`stream_status_view`.`orchestrator_url` ASC

panels.title: Median Output FPS by Orchestrator URL
